function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE

risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability of systematic literature review slr to synthesize academic and grey literature not indexed in popular search engines","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 through archival data research and literature review","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stress on healthcare infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on the economic system","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Panic buying and fragility of the existing supply chain model","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of vital medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stress on healthcare systems and risk of food insecurity due to lockdowns and border restrictions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued reporting of new cases of covid-19 in different parts of the globe","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-economic impact 36,000 deaths per year in the uk are linked to long-term exposure to air pollutants, further increasing the impact of air pollution on public health and wellbeing.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in environmental noise over the lockdown period has been reported to have saved more lives than those already caused by covid-19 in china, indicating the well-being","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of noise on exercise rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on
